productDescription: Our go-to for a minimal, folk look, the Lou jumpsuit is our straight-cut style. With a classic v-neck, mother of pearl shell buttons, pockets and a wide leg, it's patterned with as little seaming as possible. The Lou is both warm and cold weather-ready and looks best with comfy knit or blouse underneath.

optionalInfo.material: 100% Organic European Linen, certified with STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX.
optionalInfo.fit: One size available only. This garment fits from size S to L (EU 36 – 40). Marie wears our one-size, is 1.8m tall (5’10”) and normally wears an EU 36.
optionalInfo.production: This garment is handmade in the Netherlands in small batches with a responsible factory. It’s made of certified OEKO-TEX organic linen sourced from Germany with flax grown in South West Europe.
